mapper.select: /* main.getPjtSummary */ SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_USER_INFO) AS USER_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_PROJECT) AS PJT_CNT , (SELECT FORMAT(SUM(LAST_AMOUNT),0) FROM TB_WRITTEN_REQUEST) AS PJT_AMOUNT FROM DUAL

/* main.getProgList01 */ SELECT A.PROG_NO , A.AREA_CD , A.CENTER_NM , A.INTRO , A.SERVICE_DESC , A.PROFILE_FILE_CD , ( SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE WHERE GROUP_CD = 'AREA_CD' AND CODE_CD = A.AREA_CD ) AS AREA_NM , ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(WORK_ITEM_NM ORDER BY WORK_ITEM_NM SEPARATOR ', ') AS WORK_ITEM_NM FROM TB_PROG_WORK_ITEM WHERE PROG_NO = A.PROG_NO) AS WORK_ITEM_NM FROM TB_PROG A ORDER BY A.PROG_NO DESC LIMIT #{PROG_PAGE}, 4
